column4: Looks like I have to reinstall Ubuntu just to fix my dvd problem :(
I used Nautilus lastnite to copy over some files from DVD...now when I insert dvds to my drive, it doesnt automount, nor does it recognize it
ah, and can be a hardware problem too, do you still have windows to test it?
its listed in my fstab though
ok let my try powering off
thats my dvd line, its a DVD-R drive
: try replacing your line with mine
: hdb is only if you have another hdd in IDE2
so, try replacing the line and reboot
